description: Retrieves the specified inline policy document that is embedded in the specified IAM user. An IAM user can also have managed policies attached to it. To retrieve a managed policy document that is attached to a user, use  GetPolicy to determine the policy's default version. Then use  GetPolicyVersion to retrieve the policy document. For more information about policies, see Managed policies and inline policies in the IAM User Guide.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: The name of the user who the policy is associated with. This parameter allows (through its regex pattern) a string of characters consisting of upper and lowercase alphanumeric characters with no spaces. You can also include any of the following characters: _+=,.@-

parameters.name: PolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the policy document to get. This parameter allows (through its regex pattern) a string of characters consisting of upper and lowercase alphanumeric characters with no spaces. You can also include any of the following characters: _+=,.@-

nested_items.name: UserName
nested_items.description: The user the policy is associated with.
